title: True tickets. Data persist, data delete. Your choice.
text: Doesn't matter if you event is small, medium, huge, massive. Our architecture is developed with newest and strongest technologies 2021. We are always improving our skills, and we have different servers so your data will be always safe. Oh, but you can delete it when you want, as said before, the whole concept is you are the owner, so you decide if the data persist or not. Be smart.
